apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji showcases a couple formed by two individuals with distinct skin tones, one medium-dark and the other light, their forms elegantly sculpted with Apple's signature 3D shading. A luminous heart, glowing with a soft gradient, sits between them, symbolizing unity and love that bridges differences, a testament to Apple's inclusive design. The overall impression on Apple devices is one of tenderness and deep connection.
